descriptions.create: Your ticket has been created. Click the button below to access it!
descriptions.close: The ticket has been closed successfully!
descriptions.delete: The ticket has been deleted successfully!
descriptions.reopen: The ticket has been reopened successfully!
descriptions.claim: The ticket has been claimed successfully!
descriptions.unclaim: The ticket has been unclaimed successfully!
descriptions.pin: The ticket has been pinned successfully!
descriptions.unpin: The ticket has been unpinned successfully!
descriptions.rename: The ticket has been renamed to {0} successfully!
descriptions.move: The ticket has been moved to {0} successfully!
descriptions.add: {0} has been added to the ticket successfully!
descriptions.remove: {0} has been removed from the ticket successfully!
descriptions.statsReset: The bot stats have been reset successfully!
descriptions.statsError:
Unable to view ticket stats!
{0} is not a ticket!
descriptions.blacklistViewTip: Use "/blacklist add" to blacklist a user!
descriptions.clearVerify:
Are you sure you want to delete multiple tickets?
This action can't be undone!
descriptions.autocloseLeave: This ticket has been autoclosed because the creator left the server!
descriptions.autocloseTimeout: This ticket has been autoclosed because it has been inactive for more than `{0}h`!
descriptions.autodeleteLeave: This ticket has been autodeleted because the creator left the server!
descriptions.autodeleteTimeout: This ticket has been autodeleted because it has been inactive for more than `{0} days`!
descriptions.autocloseEnabled:
Autoclose has been enabled in this ticket!
It will be closed when it is inactive for more than `{0}h`!
descriptions.autocloseDisabled:
Autoclose has been disabled in this ticket!
It won't be closed automatically anymore!
descriptions.autodeleteEnabled:
Autodelete has been enabled in this ticket!
It will be deleted when it is inactive for more than `{0} days`!
descriptions.autodeleteDisabled:
Autodelete has been disabled in this ticket!
It won't be deleted automatically anymore!
descriptions.ticketMessageLimit: You can only create {0} ticket(s) at the same time!
descriptions.ticketMessageAutoclose: This ticket will be autoclosed when inactive for {0}h!
descriptions.ticketMessageAutodelete: This ticket will be autodeleted when inactive for {0} days!
descriptions.panelReady:
You can find the panel below!
This message can now be deleted!

success.textFileDescription: This is the text transcript of a deleted ticket!
success.htmlProgress: Please wait while this html transcript is getting processed...
success.createdChannel: A new {0} transcript has been created in the server!
success.createdCreator: A new {0} transcript has been created for one of your tickets!

errors.error:
Something went wrong while trying to create the transcript.
What would you like to do?

This ticket won't be deleted until you click one of these buttons.

descriptions.askForInfo: Contact the owner of this bot for more info!
descriptions.askForInfoResolve: Contact the bot owner of this bot if this issue doesn't resolve after a few tries.

descriptions.notInGuild: This {0} doesn't work in DM! Please try it again in a server!

Please try again in a few seconds!

permissions.developer: You need to be the developer of the bot.
permissions.owner: You need to be the server owner.
permissions.admin: You need to be a server admin.

commands.reason: Specify an optional reason that will be visible in logs.
commands.help: Get a list of all the available commands.
commands.panel: Spawn a message with a dropdown or buttons (for ticket creation).
commands.panelId: The identifier of the panel that you want to spawn.
commands.panelAutoUpdate: Do you want this panel to automatically update when edited?
commands.ticketId: The identifier of the ticket that you want to create.
commands.deleteNoTranscript: Delete this ticket without creating a transcript.
commands.claimUser: Claim this ticket to someone else instead of yourself.
commands.moveId: The identifier of the option that you want to move to.
commands.renameName: The new name for this ticket.
commands.add: Add a user to a ticket.
commands.remove: Remove a user from a ticket.
commands.blacklistView: View a list of the current blacklist.
commands.blacklistAdd: Add a user to the blacklist.
commands.blacklistRemove: Remove a user from the blacklist.
commands.blacklistGet: Get the details from a blacklisted user.
commands.blacklistGetUser: The user to get details from.
commands.stats: View statistics from the bot, a member or a ticket.
commands.statsReset: Reset all the stats of the bot (and start counting from zero).
commands.statsUser: View the stats from a user in the server.
commands.statsTicket: View the stats of a ticket in the server.
commands.clear: Delete multiple tickets at the same time.
commands.autocloseEnableTime: The amount of hours this ticket needs to be inactive to close it.
commands.autodeleteEnableTime: The amount of days this ticket needs to be inactive to delete it.

helpMenu.help: Get a list of all the available commands.
helpMenu.close: Close a ticket, this disables writing in this channel.
helpMenu.delete: Delete a ticket, this creates a transcript when enabled.
helpMenu.reopen: Reopen a ticket, this enables writing in this channel again.
helpMenu.pin: Pin a ticket. This will move the ticket to the top and will add a 'ðŸ“Œ' emoij to the name.
helpMenu.unpin: Unpin a ticket. The ticket will stay on it's position but will lose the 'ðŸ“Œ' emoij.
helpMenu.move: Move a ticket. This will change the type of this ticket.
helpMenu.rename: Rename a ticket. This will change the channel name of this ticket.
helpMenu.claim: Claim a ticket. With this, you can let your team know you are handling this ticket.
helpMenu.unclaim: Unclaim a ticket. With this, you can let your team know that this ticket is free again.
helpMenu.add: Add a user to a ticket. This will allow the user to read & write in this ticket.
helpMenu.remove: Remove a user from a ticket. This will remove the ability to read & write for a user in this ticket.
helpMenu.panel: Spawn a message with a dropdown or buttons (for ticket creation).
helpMenu.blacklistView: View a list of the current blacklist.
helpMenu.blacklistAdd: Add a user to the blacklist.
helpMenu.blacklistRemove: Remove a user from the blacklist.
helpMenu.blacklistGet: Get the details from a blacklisted user.
helpMenu.statsTicket: View the stats of a ticket in the server.
helpMenu.statsUser: View the stats from a user in the server.
helpMenu.statsReset: Reset all the stats of the bot (and start counting from zero).
